article.headline: Rice 102, Dallas 79
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Michael Harris scored 23 points and had 10 rebounds and Rice shot 68 percent from the floor to beat The University of Dallas 102-79 Tuesday night. J.R. Harrison scored 14 points, Brock Gillespie added 12 and Jason McKrieth had 11 for the Owls. Shane Lungwitz led Dallas (7-3) with 43 points, 11 rebounds and four assists. Rice (8-2) scored on six of its first eight possessions to take an early 14-0 lead. The Owls took a 44-23 lead late in the first half but Dallas made 3-pointers on its final four possessions of the first half to make the score 49-35 at halftime. The Owls scored 66 points in the paint while Dallas managed just 33. The Crusaders shot 42 percent from the floor.
